title: Natural Hydration: Electrolytes the Ayurvedic Way
author: Harish
excerpt: Hydration is more than water—electrolytes and gentle nutrients restore balance. Learn how amla and coconut minerals can hydrate naturally and safely.
content:
Why Electrolytes Matter

During exertion or heat exposure we lose salts and minerals—simply drinking plain water can dilute electrolytes. A balanced rehydration mix restores mineral balance and supports recovery.

Ayurvedic Ingredients for Hydration

  • Coconut water powder: Natural source of potassium and minerals.
  • Amla: Antioxidant and mild cooling support.
  • Rock salt: Adds essential minerals.
  • Jaggery/coconut sugar: Gentle glucose to aid absorption.

When to Use

  • After intense exercise.
  • During hot weather or travel.
  • When feeling weak or lightheaded from dehydration.

Safety Notes

People with kidney disease, hypertension, or those on medication that affects electrolytes should consult a doctor before using electrolyte mixes routinely.
